crmPack 0.2.8
  • Reference

Update method for the "DataDA" class

update-DataDA-method.Rd

Update observations in the DataDA object

# S4 method for DataDA
update(object, factDLTs, factSurv, factT0, thisDose,
  trialtime, ID = NULL, newCohort = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

object

the old DataDA object
ID

the patient IDs
newCohort

logical: if TRUE (default) the new data are assigned to a new cohort
…

not used
x

the dose level (one level only!)
y

the DLT vector (0/1 vector), for all patients in this cohort
u

the DLT free survival information

Value

the new DataDA object

Examples

thisData <- DataDA(x=c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6, 10, 10, 10),
                   y=c(0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0),
                   doseGrid=
                     c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6,
                       seq(from=10, to=80, by=2)),
                   u=c(42,30,15,5,20,25,30,60),
                   t0=c(0,-15,-30,-40,-55,-70,-75,-85),
                   Tmax=60,
                   npiece=10)
#> Error in DataDA(x = c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6, 10, 10, 10), y = c(0, 0, 1,     1, 0, 0, 1, 0), doseGrid = c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6, seq(from = 10,     to = 80, by = 2)), u = c(42, 30, 15, 5, 20, 25, 30, 60),     t0 = c(0, -15, -30, -40, -55, -70, -75, -85), Tmax = 60,     npiece = 10): could not find function "DataDA"


## todo: update this example with new function call structure 
factDLTs <- thisData@y
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'thisData' not found
factSurv <- thisData@u
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'thisData' not found
factT0   <- thisData@t0
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'thisData' not found
thisT0   <- 5
thisDose <- 20
thisDLTs <- 0
thisSurv <- 20

tempData <- update(object=thisData,
                   factDLTs= c(factDLTs,thisDLTs),  ####the y will be updated according to u 
                   factSurv= c(factSurv,thisSurv),
                   factT0= c(factT0,thisT0),
                   thisDose= thisDose,
                   trialtime= 8)  ####this is the globle timeline for a trial 
#> Error in update(object = thisData, factDLTs = c(factDLTs, thisDLTs), factSurv = c(factSurv,     thisSurv), factT0 = c(factT0, thisT0), thisDose = thisDose,     trialtime = 8): object 'thisData' not found
